name: Super Space Shooter (SadNK)
description:
a simple but fun space shooter to play

Controls:

Space - fire

E - shield 

A - move left 

S - move down 

D - move right 

W - move up

Power ups:

Red - Improves fire

Yellow - increases fire rate 

Cian - increases speed 

Credits:

Music:

"Darkling" Kevin macleod (incompetech.com)
